sub_title: Business Analyst at citizenM hotels: steering on value & data-informed decision-making | Analytics | Strategy | Agile Methodologies
summary:
I am on a relentless mission to leverage the role of data and analytics for optimal business models and strategy. I derive energy from connecting dots at the nexus of analytics, strategy and product innovation. I add value by translating data insights into concrete business tactics AND promoting a culture where data-informed insights trump "opinion culture''

My versatile skill set encompasses business analysis, product strategy, project management as well as a proven ability to navigate complex problem-solving scenarios.

In addition to my professional prowess, I am an ENFJ-A according to the MBTI profile, emphasizing my strong leadership qualities and people-centric approach. With an LBSI profile of 7 [2579], I bring a unique blend of analytical thinking and strategic vision to every project.

Let's connect and unlock new dimensions of success together!

profile_positions.title: BUSINESS ANALYST - CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE

profile_positions.description:
As an Independent Business Consultant, I demonstrate exceptional aptitude in delivering metrics, findings, and dashboards that drive analytical insights and business decisions. I have delivered high-performance outcomes in providing Business Intelligence (BI) services to several clients, delivering exceptional assistance in exploring the East and West African agri-food markets. 

🏆 𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:

❑ Mentoring and coaching start-ups and their team members in the comprehensive components of company formation – feasibility, needs assessment, business plan generation, business model alternatives, financial forecasting and Life Cycle Analysis.
❑ Evaluating the scope and complexity of all the business projects to develop the appropriate frameworks and innovations. Supporting the development and execution of a wide range of market expansion strategies.
